amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 425 which prohibits the use of funds to further implement coastal and marine spatial planning and management components of the National Ocean Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 425, which prohibits the use of funds to further implement coastal and marine spatial planning and management components of the National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 238 (Roll no. 398).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 238 (Roll no. 398).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
